label: AB2_oP6_58_a_g-003
title: Marcasite (FeS$_{2}$, $C18$) Structure
comments:
FeS$_{2}$ has been found in at least four forms: \begin{itemize} \item a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_aP12_1_4a_8a-001}{triclinic ($P1$ \#1) phase}, \item a low temperature \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP12_29_a_2a-001}{orthorhombic pyrite phase}, \item the most commonly observed state, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_cP12_205_a_c-001}{cubic pyrite ($C2$)}, and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP6_58_a_g-003}{orthorhombic martensite ($C18$)} (this structure). \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP6_58_a_g-001}{Hydrophilite (CaCl$_{2}$, $C35$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP6_58_a_g-002}{$\eta$–Fe$_{2}$C}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP6_58_a_g-003}{marcasite (FeS$_{2}$, $C18$)} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB2\_oP6\_58\_a\_g. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
